ai-tha-ap561:1.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap561:1.3_0: after seeing the bowl of water,
ai-tha-ap561:1.4_0: I filled the grass with my hand
ai-tha-ap561:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap561:2.4_0: this is the fruit of the unloved.
ai-tha-ap561:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap561:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sivaka.
